availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John S. Ray (Hickman County, Kentucky, teacher and farmer)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, teacher and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Dennis Ray and Nancy Ray. Married to Mary E. Ray. Father of Alfred J. Ray. Teacher in Hickman County in 1860. Farmer in Hickman County in 1870.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman, Hay's District, p. 121. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman, Hay's District, p. 39. Find A Grave, "John S.
Ray (February 7, 1832-October 13, 1881)," Memorial #165539723, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/165539723 (accessed March 20, 2018).
